resources.string:
2017.04.02 Alpha (v17) 
• Distance will be updated automatically 
• Support for energy-saving localization method / Android O compatibility 
• Smaller file size for non-changing offers 
• Updated ingredient recognition 
• (Fix) Starting time for changing offers is now shown correctly 

2017.03.26 Alpha (v16) 
• (Fix) Error reports and usability reports can be independently enabled/disabled 
• Distance is now shown inside restaurant offer sections (work in progress) 

2017.03.19 Alpha (v15) 
• Error reports and usability reports can be independently enabled/disabled 
• Sort restaurant's offers by distance to the current location 

2017.03.12 Alpha (v14) 
• Usability statistics enabled by Google Analytics 
• Added permission ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE for Google Analytics 
• Preferences to enable opt out 
• Optimized loading of restaurant offers 

2017.03.05 Alpha (v13) 
• Permisson "PHONE_CALL" is now optional. Installation on tablets again possible. 
• Android 4.4 devices is able to start again 

2017.02.25 Alpha (v12) 
• New permission PHONE_CALL enables calling restaurants 
• Detail page: Added parking, payment and phone number 
• Dashboard: Select your restaurant location (Darmstadt or Weiterstadt) 
• Dashboard: Card layout instead of grey boxes 
• Sync: Only one sync per minute 
• Fix: Improved stability for devices smaller than Android 6 Nougat 

2017.02.18 Alpha (v11) 
• Fix: Improved layout for tablets 
• Fix: Improved stability (Resolved crashed after opening links, rotation, …) 

2017.02.11 Alpha (v10) 
• Dashboard: Iff no offers for today, show offers of next day 
• Detail page: Download of Restaurant images and slideshow, Restaurant descriptions and opening times can be expanded 
• Help page: Showing changelog at click on version, Inserted terms of usage 
• Fix: Detail page now working for Huawei P8 

2017.02.04 Alpha (v9) 
• Detail-Seite: GoogleMaps, HereMaps, DB Navigator und Co geöffnet werden 
• Detail-Seite: Die Webseite des Restaurants geöffnet werden 
• Improved auto recognition of incredients 
• Improved RAM usage 
• Support for Android build-in backups 
• Fix for detail page: Updating times after UI restart 
• Fix: detail page can be opened after rotation
